pr_title: NMS-12483: Publish AMD64/ARMv7/ARM64 Docker images for Minion

timeline.message: NMS-12483: Remove OCI build from RPM build job
NMS-12483: Switch Minion OCI build from RPM in DEB build jobs
NMS-12483: Fetch Minion tarball and store as artifact
NMS-12483: We double gzip the minion.tar.gz, it prevents us using ADD in Dockerfile

NMS-12483: Migrate OCI build for Minion to Ubuntu

Migrated from our CentOS 8 to an Ubuntu base image.  We add Multi-Stage
support to reduce the final image size.
NMS-12483: Add OCI build step and persist artifact
NMS-12483: Minimal smoke depends now on Minion DEB build job instead of RPM
NMS-12483: Set permissions explicitly, Docker 19+ preserves permissions, everything earlier doesn't
NMS-12483: Add a tarball assembly and remove makedeb dependencies which prevents running in a machine on old ubuntu 16
NMS-12483: We compile with skip tarball workaround with a another compile run
NMS-12483: Migrate tarball to a machine job which can run the docker buildx features
NMS-12483: Set vcpu for tarball to 2
NMS-12483: Enable tarballs in compile job to be able to run the assemble

NMS-12483: Add docker build to tarball build step

Add makensis fake script which is a dependency in our assembly step. We don't need it for Linux based distrubutions.
Setup a docker buildx and setup the environment to enable multiarch build. The Minion Docker OCI build steps are moved
from the minion-deb-build to the tarball-assembly job.
NMS-12483: Migrate to use docker-buildx instead of docker build
NMS-12483: Depend smoke tests on tarball assembly for OCI files

NMS-12483: Add docker buildx for releases as multi arch and single OCI

Enhance our bild job to build for master a multi-architecture OCI with a manifest for arm/v7, arm64 and amd64 when we
make a release and push it directly to the registry.

To run same build instruction and remove Bash script complexity, I've migrated the our build scripts to a single
Makefile. When run make it creates the OCI file as local build for the single x86_64 architecture as OCI file. The
version number as docker tag is fetched from the root pom.xml. For a release we create additionally a OCI file for
x86_64 as artifact file.
NMS-12483: Trigger a build and test publish Minion Multi-arch image to registry
NMS-12483: Restore Minion Deb steps and branch filters
NMS-12483: Allow to set a base image in Makefile
NMS-12483: Load minion.oci instead of generic container.oci file
NMS-12483: Add circleci build number to artifact OCI file
NMS-12483: Restore minion-deb-build requirements and set python2 explicitly in makensis fake
NMS-12483: Improve readme and add all make targets
NMS-12483: Set defaults for build information
NMS-12483: Remove Minion publish oci jobs
NMS-12483: Make container-fs consistent for scripts and assets
NMS-12483: Set default container image with SSH client for Karaf health check
NMS-12483: Restore SSH authentication for health check and fix NMS-12600
NMS-12483: Set OCI artifact tag to minion:latest
NMS-12483: Migrate confd configuration from NMS-12578
NMS-12483: We drop support installing Minion container from packages like RPMS/DEB and use just tarballs instead.
NMS-12483: Cleanup whitespaces
NMS-12483: Move to container-fs directory
NMS-12483: Add a switch case for branches we want to push images to the registry
NMS-12483: Whitespace cleanup
NMS-12483: Cross fingers - smoke-test-full
NMS-12483: Fetch assembly in Makefile to make it easier to run locally

@@ -437,6 +432,94 @@ jobs:
     steps:
       - run-build:
           number-vcpu: 8
+
+  tarball-assembly:
+    machine:
+      image: ubuntu-1604:201903-01
+      docker_layer_caching: true
+    environment:
+      DOCKER_CLI_EXPERIMENTAL: enabled
+    parameters:
+      number-vcpu:
+        default: 2
+        type: integer
+      vaadin-javamaxmem:
+        default: 1g
+        type: string
+    steps:
+      - attach_workspace:
+          at: ~/
+      - run:
+          name: multiarch/qemu-user-static
+          command: docker run --rm --privileged multiarch/qemu-user-static --reset -p yes
+      - run:
+          name: Install Docker buildx
+          command: |
+            sudo wget https://github.com/docker/buildx/releases/download/v0.3.1/buildx-v0.3.1.linux-amd64 -O /usr/local/bin/docker-buildx
+            sudo chmod a+x /usr/local/bin/docker-buildx
+            sudo systemctl restart docker
+      - dockerhub-login
+      - run:
+          name: Assemble tarballs
+          # Install fake makensis to satisfy the assemble dependency
+          command: |
+            sudo cp .circleci/scripts/makensis.py /usr/local/bin/makensis
+            ./assemble.pl -Dopennms.home=/opt/opennms \
+                          -DskipTests \
+                          -DupdatePolicy=never
+      - run:
+          name: Collect tarball artifacts
+          command: |
+            mkdir target/tarballs
+            find ./target -name "*.tar.gz" -type f -not -iname '*source*' -exec cp {} ./target/tarballs/opennms.tar.gz \;
+            find ./opennms-assemblies/minion/target -name "*.tar.gz" -type f -not -iname '*source*' -exec cp {} ./target/tarballs/minion.tar.gz \;
+            find ./opennms-assemblies/sentinel/target -name "*.tar.gz" -type f -not -iname '*source*' -exec cp {} ./target/tarballs/sentinel.tar.gz \;
+      - run:
+          name: Build Minion OCI
+          command: |
+            cd opennms-container/minion
+            make DOCKER_TAG="minion:latest" BUILD_NUMBER="${CIRCLE_BUILD_NUM}" BUILD_URL="${CIRCLE_BUILD_URL}" BUILD_BRANCH="${CIRCLE_BRANCH}"
+            case "${CIRCLE_BRANCH}" in
+              master)
+                make DOCKER_ARCH="linux/amd64,linux/arm/v7,linux/arm64" \
+                     DOCKER_FLAGS=--push \
+                     VERSION="$(../pom2version.py ../../pom.xml)" \
+                     BUILD_NUMBER="${CIRCLE_BUILD_NUM}" \
+                     BUILD_URL="${CIRCLE_BUILD_URL}" \
+                     BUILD_BRANCH="${CIRCLE_BRANCH}"
+                ;;
+              develop)
+                make DOCKER_ARCH="linux/amd64,linux/arm/v7,linux/arm64" \
+                     DOCKER_FLAGS=--push \
+                     VERSION="$(../pom2version.py ../../pom.xml)" \
+                     BUILD_NUMBER="${CIRCLE_BUILD_NUM}" \
+                     BUILD_URL="${CIRCLE_BUILD_URL}" \
+                     BUILD_BRANCH="${CIRCLE_BRANCH}"
+                ;;
+              jira/NMS-12483)

-# Use Java base image and setup required RPMS as cacheable image.

-ARG BASE_IMAGE="opennms/openjdk"

-ARG REPO_RPM="https://yum.opennms.org/repofiles/opennms-repo-stable-rhel8.noarch.rpm"

+# We set the correct permissions in this stage, so we don't have this as an addtional

+RUN groupadd --gid 10001 minion && \
